hero.title: From concept to execution, I will create your digital future!
hero.main-text: As a full-stack web and mobile developer, I transform ideas into engaging digital experiences. Combining creativity and technology, I create solutions that connect people to the digital future, always focusing on innovation and excellence. Whether for apps, websites or complete platforms, I'm here to take your project to the next level.
hero.subtitle: Let's get this idea off the ground today!

about.description: I'm a web and mobile developer with experience in creating results-driven websites, apps and landing pages optimized to attract and convert visitors into customers. My mission is to help you create a strong online presence.
about.list-title: Here are the services I offer for your project:
list-items: **Responsive Design:** Your landing page will be 100% responsive, working perfectly on mobile devices, tablets and desktops.
**Performance and Speed:** Optimized code to ensure fast loading, providing a fluid experience for users.
**On-Page SEO:** Setting up tags and best practices to improve visibility in search engines.
**Integration with Marketing Tools:** Such as lead capture forms, Google Analytics, email marketing, among others.
**Focus on Conversion:** Design with strategic calls to action (CTA) and color psychology to increase conversion.
list-items2: **Agility:** I use agile methodologies to maintain constant communication and deliver results on time.
**Transparency:** You will be involved in all stages of the project.
**Results:** Each decision is focused on generating value for your business
about.subtitle: Let's work together and make it happen!

steps.title: Planning and Discovery
steps.description: Conversation to understand your ideas, create wireframes and validate the design.

steps.title: Responsive Design
steps.description: Creation of a modern layout adapted to all devices.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: I transform your design into a functional website or application. Secure and efficient backend, dynamic and fast frontend.

steps.title: Testing and Optimization
steps.description: I make sure everything works perfectly! I perform quality and performance testing, optimizing for SEO and user experience.

steps.title: Delivery and Support
steps.description: I present the final project with complete documentation. I also provide initial technical support and partner with you for future updates.

skills.title: My Skills:
soft-skills-items: **Communication:** Explaining technical ideas to colleagues or arguing and providing input on design/structure choices for a project.
**Problem-solving:** Finding creative and efficient solutions to bugs and any challenges encountered during development.
**Teamwork:** Collaborating with designers, product managers, and other developers to achieve common goals.
**Time management:** Prioritizing tasks to deliver projects on time.
**Adaptability:** Quickly learning a new technology or adjusting to changing requirements on a project.

project-cta.title: Did you like what you saw?

contact.title: Thanks for the message
contact.subtitle: We will do a great job together!
